Checkpoint.synopsis: Dialogue with the main guard in the Undercellar Entrance, where the player can try to detect what are they guarding and convince them to allow access.
Checkpoint.how_to_trigger: Interacting with the character at -1690; 12; 574 or activating the trigger located at -1688; 14; 575

Checkpoint_27.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_27.text: Did I whisper? I said GET LOST.
Checkpoint_27.context: NodeContext: Threatening, spelling out "Get Lost" like he's speaking to an idiot

Checkpoint_29.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_29.text: I said you could come in. Didn't say you could leave.
Checkpoint_29.context: NodeContext: With a smile - about to have some fun

Checkpoint_118.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_118.text: Boss doesn't like outsiders sniffing around.
Checkpoint_118.context: NodeContext: With a smile - about to have some fun

Checkpoint_64.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_64.text: Shouldn't go wandering in dark alleys. Very dangerous hobby. Gets people killed.
Checkpoint_64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Big and imposing hereNodeContext: Scolding

Checkpoint_126.speaker: Minsc
Checkpoint_126.text: It is true. Boo has slain many who have greeted him so impolitely.

Checkpoint_17.speaker: Jaheira
Checkpoint_17.text: Oh, but surely we're safe with one of Nine-Fingers' big strapping boys to protect us.

Checkpoint_130.speaker: Jaheira
Checkpoint_130.text: That's her sigil on your ring, is it not?

Checkpoint_63.speaker: Narrator
Checkpoint_63.text: *On the half-orc's finger, you notice an unusual ring: heavy, and with a strange symbol carved on its surface.*
Checkpoint_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

Checkpoint_128.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_128.text: Scurry away, gubuk. Before I crush you.
Checkpoint_128.context:
NodeContext: Menacing. 
"dglinkarz" = glin-KARZ (roughly equal emphasis on both syllables, with a strong k to start the second syllable. "Karz"  like "cars", but elongating the a and z).  
"Gubuk" - GU-buk (Both "u"s as in "push"/"look"/"book"). 
"Nothrakash" - noth-RAK-ash (Harsh, slightly rolled "r".)

Checkpoint_135.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_135.text: What's with that strange wall over there? Is that what you're guarding?

Checkpoint_104.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_104.text: Sneaking into MY ALLEY?! Nobody sneaks into MY ALLEY!
Checkpoint_104.context: NodeContext: shouted, getting the attention of the other guards a few metres away

Checkpoint_55.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_55.text: I found this strange ring. Do you know anything about it?

Checkpoint_81.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_81.text: I just want a quick look around. Where's the harm?

Checkpoint_60.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_60.text: Harm can be anywhere you like - nose, kneecaps, fingernails...

Checkpoint_127.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_127.text: I came by earlier and lost something. I just want to retrieve it.

Checkpoint_84.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_84.text: Something valuable? Then you must get it back.

Checkpoint_50.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_50.text: Lot of people lose things in this alley. Like their LIVES.
Checkpoint_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponNodeContext: Threatening, thinks he's being very witty

Checkpoint_106.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_106.text: Are those your final words? Usually people scream for their mothers.

Checkpoint_69.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_69.text: Peace, peace. Fearsome individuals always welcome in Tusgront's alley.
Checkpoint_69.context: NodeContext: Calming you, with a smile - he doesn't think you're fearsome at all

Checkpoint_77.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_77.text: When I kill you, you won't have time to scream.

Checkpoint_25.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_25.text: Surely one little peep won't hurt? It can be our little secret.

Checkpoint_1.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_1.text: Just me and you. I like that. Harmless little secret.
Checkpoint_1.context: NodeContext: Realises what this means - he can pick you off

Checkpoint_33.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_33.text: Come in. Take a look around.
Checkpoint_33.context: InternalNodeContext: with a smile - he's plotting something, not particularly subtle

Checkpoint_56.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_56.text: Secrets are good. Violence is better.
Checkpoint_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponNodeContext: Smirking - he's about to kill you

Checkpoint_91.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_91.text: Let me through, or I swear on Gruumsh's eye I'll tear your limbs from their sockets.

Checkpoint_70.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_70.text: Peace, peace. Your belly burns too hot. It's just a simple alleyway.
Checkpoint_70.context: NodeContext: with a smile - not scared in the slightest

Checkpoint_65.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_65.text: Not if I tear yours out first.

Checkpoint_12.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_12.text: Thank you for the list - now I know which parts of you to break first.

Checkpoint_78.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_78.text: Look closer at the ring. Try to recall the symbol's meaning.

Checkpoint_22.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_22.text: Look closer at the ring. Try to recall the symbol's meaning.

Checkpoint_86.speaker: Narrator
Checkpoint_86.text: *You recall seeing this symbol on crates marked for Nine-Fingers Keene, leader of the Guild. The thug works for her.*

Checkpoint_123.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_123.text: Oi. Stop staring. Start walking. Last chance.

Checkpoint_6.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_6.text: I've come from Darkhold. I'm here to join the Zhentarim inside.

Checkpoint_80.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_80.text: Another one come to take our coin and clog our halls.

Checkpoint_89.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_89.text: Fine - I'll show you in. Nine-Fingers will give you orders.
Checkpoint_89.context: NodeContext: with a sigh, has no choice

Checkpoint_95.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_95.text: I've come to warn Nine-Fingers. The Zhentarim are planning to kill her.

Checkpoint_14.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Beckoning for player to followNodeContext: Urgent

Checkpoint_109.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_109.text: Wait. Where's my ring? Did you take my ring?
Checkpoint_109.context: CinematicNodeContext: Checks hand/notices ring is missing (doesn't need to be shown in close-up)InternalNodeContext: Panicking, accusing

Checkpoint_18.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Getting ready/drawing weaponNodeContext: Furious

Checkpoint_116.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_116.text: Careful - that's High Harper Jaheira you're speaking to.

Checkpoint_42.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_42.text: Jaheira...? The same Jaheira who burned down Fugal's tea-shop? I saw that fire. Very big. Strange smell.
Checkpoint_42.context: NodeContext: A little fearful but trying not to show it. He's just unwittingly bad-mouthed someone with quite a reputation. At the end, recollecting something interesting.

Checkpoint_54.context: NodeContext: Remembering a past vigilante effort of Jaheira's (FOO-gill)

Checkpoint_99.speaker: Jaheira
Checkpoint_99.text: The fire was his own fault. Bad enough he was adding silkroot to his brews - but he stored it poorly, too.
Checkpoint_99.context: NodeContext: Not fully defensive, but correcting the record - she only went to shut down a drugs operation, the fire was entirely incidental

Checkpoint_94.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_94.text: Nasty little tea man. Sold me some of his rotten leaves once. Made me feel slow, and stupid.
Checkpoint_94.context: NodeContext: Vague approval - grateful that Jaheira shut down a narcotic tea shop, annoyed at the memory of having been tricked

Checkpoint_45.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_45.context: NodeContext: Pleased, apparently unaware that he is currently slow and stupid

Checkpoint_57.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_57.text: Go on, then. If the guildmaster doesn't want you in her hall, she'll tell you so herself.

Checkpoint_124.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_124.text: You don't recognise me? I'm Nine-Fingers' right hand. She needs me immediately.

Checkpoint_103.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_103.text: Of - of course! She didn't tell me you were coming.
Checkpoint_103.context: NodeContext: bit flustered, trying to act like he knows who the player is (he doesn't)

Checkpoint_46.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_46.text: You think I'm stupid? Well, I think you're dead.

Checkpoint_101.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_101.text: Hate to cut short conversation with such a handsome fellow, but I have urgent business with Nine-Fingers...

Checkpoint_83.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_83.text: I am handsome. Also very strong. And smart. And dis-creet.
Checkpoint_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Indicates his discretion on "dis-creet" - taps side of nose or similarInternalNodeContext: blushing, posturing. Doesn't really know what "discrete" meansNodeContext: blushing, posturing. Doesn't really know what "discrete" means

Checkpoint_24.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_24.text: That's why Nine-Fingers asked me to guard the entrance to the Guildhall.
Checkpoint_24.context: InternalNodeContext: Showing offNodeContext: Showing off

Checkpoint_137.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_137.text: Come. I'll let you in. My pleasure.

Checkpoint_111.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_111.text: Handsome - not stupid. Stupid is trying to trick me...
Checkpoint_111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponInternalNodeContext: offended, planning to attack you

Checkpoint_34.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_34.text: I'm here to see Nine-Fingers. Get in my way, and you'll lose more than your ring finger.

Checkpoint_112.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_112.text: No need for violence, friend. Just doing my job.
Checkpoint_112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws up hands - I'm not a threatNodeContext: Pacifying

Checkpoint_114.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_114.text: People think they can sneak past me: Fists, adventurers, journalists...  Got to be on my guard.

Checkpoint_10.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_10.text: Big words from such a puny mouth. Let's see how strong you really are.

Checkpoint_120.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_120.text: Shall I tell Nine-Fingers you refused to let me pass? She'll be very unhappy.

Checkpoint_30.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_30.text: You're here to see Nine-Fingers? She didn't tell me.

Checkpoint_93.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_93.text: Always 'Don't let anyone through, Tusgront.' Never 'Here's a list of special guests.' Confusing.

Checkpoint_23.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_23.text: Come. I'll take you to the Guildhall. Nine-Fingers is inside.

Checkpoint_115.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_115.text: You won't be telling her anything. 'Cause you'll be dead.

Checkpoint_72.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_72.text: Take me to Nine-Fingers, or I swear on Gruumsh's eye, I'll tear you limb from limb.

Checkpoint_9.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_9.text: Bloody Darkhold Zhents. Getting paid to lurk in our Guildhall. Never work for it.

Checkpoint_44.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_44.text: Guarding the secret entrance? Not good enough for them. But good enough for poor old Tusgront.
Checkpoint_44.context: InternalNodeContext: Moaning/Lamenting the boring job he's been given

Checkpoint_87.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_87.text: Trying to read my thoughts? Read THIS.

Checkpoint_132.speaker: Player
Checkpoint_132.text: I'm Nine Fingers new muscle. Let me pass, or I'l show you why I was hired.

Checkpoint_13.speaker: Narrator
Checkpoint_13.text: *Though you can't shake the feeling you've seen it before, the emblem's purpose is beyond your recall.*

Checkpoint_26.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_26.text: Farlin said to let you in this time. Very insistent.
Checkpoint_26.context: NodeContext: With a sigh - he's a bit reluctant, but likes Farlin so will do what she asked

Checkpoint_134.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_134.text: Wait. You're Farlin's friend... She said to let you in.
Checkpoint_134.context: NodeContext: Slowly catching on, then becoming friendly

Checkpoint_97.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_97.text: Funny little gnome, she is - always laughing at me. Even when I don't joke.
Checkpoint_97.context: NodeContext: Oblivious to the fact Farlin is mocking him, thinks she's just a good-natured little gnome

Checkpoint_76.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_76.text: Stop! What are you doing? Are you trying to sneak past Tusgront?
Checkpoint_76.context: NodeContext: Accusing, sense of threat building

Checkpoint_73.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_73.text: Do not worry. Guild's friends are Tusgront's friends.

Checkpoint_82.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_82.text: And I don't hurt my friends. Unless they deserve it.
Checkpoint_82.context: NodeContext: Breaking the tension - he was toying with you. Still a slight hint of threat at the end

Checkpoint_79.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_79.text: You have a death wish? I said CLEAR OFF.
Checkpoint_79.context: NodeContext: Threatening, spelling out "Clear off" like he's speaking to an idiot

Checkpoint_90.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_90.text: Go on down. Tusgront is keeping watch.

Checkpoint_102.speaker: Tusgront
Checkpoint_102.text: Are you lost? Or just stupid? Go. Away.
